name: SCP-Chronicles - Chapter 1
description:
THIS IS NOT ANOTHER CONTAINMENT BREACH  GAME OK ?

You will play with assimov´s lawbringers Mobile Task Force 13.

What appeared to be a basic recovery task, quickly escalated to something larger.

You mission is not in USA - will be in Brazil and you will find out why during the consecutive events of  game. 

In this first chapter, you'll need to deal with lack of ammo, low visibility , constant awareness of danger, wise use of energy and some few puzzles. Plan your moves to make sure you can complete the journey.

Walk slow to enchance the chances of hearing something. Walk crouched to increase your stealth ability. 

Expect to encounter on our games mostly keter class scps, mostly due the fact that the other ones are secured at the foundation sites.

This game support english & portuguese.

Minimum Requirements: 

Celeron dual core 1.5Ghz , 2GB-DDR3  of ram and a Intel HD 4000.

* For linux : must have vulkan hardware, well ... you can run only with opengl 1.4, but expect some small glitches on the lights. 

Recommended Requirements : 

Our Development hardware are an RTX2060 and Ryzen 7 2700x with 16GB of DDR4 and we run it with all options on epic  settings 😬 

Please feel free to contact us at contato@vrphantom.com

Yes, it´s a DRM-Free game.
